name: C. C. Adcock
description: '''C. C. Adcock''' (born '''Charles Clinton Adcock''', 1971) is an American singer, songwriter, guitarist and [[blues rock]] musician, noted for his [[Cajun music|cajun]], [[zydeco]], [[electric blues]] and [[swamp pop]]-influenced sound and for his efforts to preserve and promote swamp pop music. He is also a Grammy-nominated music producer and film and TV composer.
